hero.headline: We Bring Your Digital Vision to Life
hero.subheadline: Beyond websites—we build brands, design digital identities, and create smart AI chatbots that connect and convert.

pain.1: Outdated website with slow loading speeds
pain.3: Poor mobile experience and clunky design

pain.7: Lack of trust due to generic or unprofessional look
pain.8: Constant need for fixes, no reliable support

benefits.2: Unique branding that tells your story and builds recognition

cta.title: Your Website, Your Brand, Your Success - We Make It Happen!
cta.subtitle: Don't settle for average. Let's craft a stunning, fast, and scalable website tailored to your business needs.

1.title: Discovery & Planning
1.description: We begin by understanding your vision and goals. Through collaborative strategy discussions, we ensure we're aligned with your goals and set clear objectives for the project.

2.title: Design & Development
2.description: Our team brings your ideas to life with creative and functional designs. We use modern technologies to develop clean, efficient code that perfectly represents your brand.

3.title: Testing & Refinement
3.description: We rigorously test the product to ensure it meets our high standards. Based on your feedback, we refine the solution to make sure it aligns perfectly with your expectations.

4.title: Launch & Support
4.description: We carefully deploy and launch your product. We also provide ongoing support to ensure it continues to perform and evolve as your business grows.

Team.title: Our Team
Team.subtitle: Meet the creative minds behind our exceptional projects

abdellah.name: Abdellah Boujoujan
abdellah.title: Founder & Software Engineer
abdellah.bio: I am a Software Engineering student and UI/UX designer, passionate about building seamless digital experiences. I focus on crafting visually engaging and highly functional websites, blending design and development to create user-friendly, high-performance solutions.

ryad.name: Ryad Benmanser
ryad.title: Co-Founder & Lead Developer
ryad.bio: I am a Software Engineering student with a strong passion for backend development. I focus on building scalable, efficient, and secure systems to power great web applications. Always looking for new challenges and ways to optimize performance.

hero.title: OUR SERVICES

hero.description: We offer comprehensive solutions to help your business stand out in the digital landscape. From creating a memorable brand identity to developing high-performing websites and AI-powered chatbots, we've got you covered with services tailored to your needs.

cta.title: Ready to Transform Your Digital Presence?
cta.subtitle: Let's work together to create solutions that help your business stand out and succeed online.

hero.title: ABOUT US
hero.headline: Turning Ideas into Digital Reality
hero.description: We are Webarify, a team of software engineering students with a shared passion for building high-quality, scalable, and innovative web solutions. Our journey started with a simple idea: to use our technical expertise and creative vision to help businesses establish a strong online presence.

story.title: Our Story
story.description: Webarify was born from a simple idea—to turn creativity and code into impactful digital experiences. As software engineering students, we saw businesses struggling with outdated websites and ineffective branding. We knew we could do better.

mission.description: What started as passion projects became a mission: to build modern, high-performing web solutions that solve real problems. Today, we help brands and businesses stand out online with sleek, scalable, and innovative web development, UI/UX design, and branding that elevate their digital presence.
